name: Ultra Pong (BrigDog)
description:
Hello and welcome to Ultra Pong!

Controls:

- Esc to back out in menus or pause the game.

- W/S are default keys for Left Player Movement.

- Up/Down arrow keys are for Right Player Movement.

Top tip! While your playing this game, you will see powerups that come in 3 different colours, green is good, you want to aim yourself to hit as many as them to weaken your opponent, yellow is okay, it doesn't really effect the players just ball, red will give bonuses to the opponent.

Most of my time making this game went towards allowing for a more customizable experience, this is my second game jam submission and the first game I've made which allows for custom bindings, custom art assets and custom volume.

Any bugs please let us know!
